title: Install dependencies + ShadCN components
description: Install @tanstack/react-form, @tanstack/react-virtual, @tanstack/pacer, zod, sonner to apps/web. Add ShadCN UI components: dialog.tsx (radix-ui Dialog primitive), tabs.tsx (radix-ui Tabs primitive), field.tsx (pure layout components for TanStack Form), sonner.tsx (Toaster wrapper without next-themes). Mount <Toaster position="top-right"> in root layout (__root.tsx). Covers FR-22, NFR-5.
